Plot: The true story of Paul Rusesabagina, a hotel manager who housed over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda.
Title: Hotel Rwanda
Actors: Xolani Mali, Don Cheadle, Desmond Dube, Hakeem Kae-Kazim
tomatoConsensus: A sobering and heartfelt tale about massacre that took place in Rwanda while most of the world looked away.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 16 wins & 42 nominations.
Country: UK, USA, Italy, South Africa, Canada
